isis.stitle: HYDRO-MAX II BRAKE MONITOR SYSTEM - DESCRIPTION - BLOCKING DIODE ASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: BLOCKING DIODE ASSEMBLY
svcproc.para: The blocking diode assembly is utilized to enable power coming from the brake switch (contacts closed) to energize the hydraulic brake relay and to feed the monitor module without back-feeding all of the ignition circuits connected to the key switch. The blocking diode assembly also enables power to be applied to the monitor module, by way of the key switch, without back-feeding to the monitor module and falsely signaling that the brake switch is closed.
